title: black
description:
The sequel to my 'yellow' and 'red' games is here!
Can you make the screen black in 50 levels?
Each level has its own logic.

Do you need help? Use the light bulb button that will appear after a while in the top right of each level to get a hint. There are multiple hints for each level.
With the premium unlock in-app you will not get ads before the hints.

A Bart Bonte / bontegames puzzle game.

comments: Funny af to see these 1 star idiots complaining about the games difficulty, such a chill game. Not too difficult nor too easy. Some puzzles are more difficult than others. The eternity of the game feels incredibly good. The music is amazing fits incredibly well with the peace associated with playing this game. Mr colourful, If I was to die some day please make "Orange" as a tribute to my name :) Highly awaiting the next release. After finishing the games I feel kinda empty :c

I love this game! I would have liked more levels as there were only 50 but that's just because I love it so much. Each level has a different interesting puzzle to figure out and if you were stumped you could receive hints by watching 5 second ads, none of that "buy a hint" or "get a new key every day you log in to receive a hint." The game also has a really cool vibe with cool music and a generally cool aesthetic. I will be downloading more of your games!

I would totally rate 5 stars, if it had more levels. I understand that its one person, good job Bart, but maybe have like 75 levels for you next game? Also, stuck on level 25, the first level I found with some difficulty. Otherwise, good puzzle, especially for someone workin alone. Edit: I understand that there are more games, but each one takes about 1 hour at most for me. I like your games Bart, but, they either need to be longer, or just a tad more challenging. Thank you Bart for your respons

I have to admit I hate puzzle games there either way to easy or way to hard (sometimes literally impossible aka a scam for money) so i didn't think this was going to be much different but oh boy was I wrong i love the creative ways for making the puzzles I'm only on level 13 but I already love it level 11 was really clever i enjoyed that one (once I figured out how to solve it 😅) I'm giving it 5 stars bc of the puzzles creativity and the thought that went into them really great game keep it up

So.. I downloaded today. Good speed for download on a puzzle. At first I was confused on how to play. I tapped everywhere on each level and on some I was stumped. To say the least this was a really cool puzzle game. I saw they had BLUE and RED for this too? I think I'll play those as well! Good job on the game play! I COMPLETED BLACK!

title: BLK - Look. Match. Chat.
description:
BLK is the new app for Black single men and Black single women with a simple mission: To create an exclusive community where Black men and Black women can find meaningful connections with people who share similar likes and interests.
 
BLK is easy and fun to use: 
•	Simply scroll through a personalized list of profiles. 
•	If you're interested, slide the profile to right to give the person a ‘Yeah’, or click the 'Heart' icon. 
•	If the feeling's mutual, then you're a match and can start chatting in our app right away. 
•	Not interested? Slide the profile to the left to give the person a ‘Nah’, or click the ‘X’ icon. 
 
Right when you join, all members can: 
•	Become part of an exclusive community for single black men and black women
•	Like other members near you
•	Customize who and what they’re looking for
•	Receive a personalized group of profiles to look through every day
•	Chat with other members if they’ve liked you back
 
Go Premium and you can also: 
•	Rewind on people to give them a second chance
•	Send over 100 Really Likes per month to stand out from the crowd and let people know that you're really interested 
•	Boost your profile each month to be one of the top profiles in your area for 30 minutes 
•	Have an uninterrupted experience with no ads!

comments: It's so many spam accounts on the app. I almost believe BLK is making up profiles to keep people subscribed. I have had the absolute weirdest interactions or none I would say. I've connected or matched with so many people, yet no communication or very odd communication, then the profile suddenly disappears. Very strange, will not re-subscribing after my subscription for this month expires.

Good app for the most part, has potential. Could be much better if it had a distance filter. I made one match so far and 7 others like me, but like my match they are TOO far away. Also maybe a 1 week free trial could promote the quality of the memberships.

Worst account management ever! I got a new phone number and now can't get back in to my account. No options to retrieve or reset user's account login information. Extremely poor design. Use brain when designing apps. Password reset option are BASIC FEATURES on every app except this one.

The app is cool but use a few tweaks. For one when looking through profiles that have liked you, I'm unable to see ALL pics from that profile. Just the main pic which sucks bc sometimes the main pic is a meme, blurry, or cuts off face. If I'm paying I should be able to see all pics on profile under that category not just the random profile swipe part. Also distance/location should be added and stick to age ranges I have chosen. I have 32-42 but get lots of 20 year olds.

I really like the concept of this app. I honestly think it should be more booming than Tinder. My only complaint is that theres no distance meter - its tragic when I find someone I think I can vibe with, come to find out they're 200 miles away. Add one of those in and it's 5 stars.

title: Black Desert Mobile
description:
"Finally, An Actual Open-World For Mobile" –TheGamer-
"The best mobile MMO gameplay" –MMORPG.com-
"A true MMO experience" –GamePress-

▶Black Desert Mobile◀
The critically-acclaimed MMO with players from over 150 countries around the world!
Experience the amazing adventure in Black Desert on Mobile.

■ Breathtaking Action
Play as 5 unique classes with dynamic skills.
Indulge in unparalled, fast-paced action and combat found only on Black Desert Mobile!

■ The Best Graphics on Mobile
Immersive world with sophisticated, high-fidelity graphics!
Take the original quality experience anywhere you go on mobile.

■ Express Yourself with Extreme Character Customization
Simple tools allow for high degree of freedom in character customization!
Become your true self with customization options that push the boundaries of gaming.

■ An Endless Amount of Content to Create the World
Vast life content, including fishing and taming, along with the your own Camp to manage and expand.
Trustworthy pets and horses to keep you company on your adventures.

[Social Media]
Follow us on our Social Media for the latest news & updates!
Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/OfficialBlackDesertMobile
Youtube : https://www.youtube.com/blackdesertmobile_en
Twitter : https://twitter.com/BlackDesertM_en

[Minimum RAM Requirements]
2GB

■ App Access
We require permission to provide the following services while you use the app.

[Required Permission]
Photos/Media/Files: Used to store files or data relevant to gameplay while the game is running and when recording/taking screenshots.

[Optional Permission]
Microphone: Used for in-game voice chat and when recording gameplay videos.

[How to Change Permissions]
▶ Android 6.0 or higher: Settings > Apps > Select Permission Settings > Permissions > Set to allow or deny
▶ Below Android 6.0: Upgrade the operating system to change settings, or delete the app
※ The app may not provide other options to change permissions itself but can always be done with the above method.
※ If the operating system is a version lower than Android 6.0, then you cannot change permission settings for individual apps. We recommend upgrading to 6.0 or higher.
※ If you deny permission for required access, it could disrupt resources or make you unable to login to the game.

summary:
Unleash the Wrath of the Vedir
Dark Knight
Arriving on March 24
developerAddress: 24, Simin-daero 327beon-gil, Dongan-gu, Anyang-si, Gyeonggi-do, Republic of Korea
recentChanges:
- New Class: Dark Knight
- New Content: Tower of Trials
- Auto-Quest feature
- Alchemy Auto-Craft feature

comments: Great game! Character creation is top notch, i actually made my wife in almost every detail. Game can get a little confusing at times but so can any mmorpg out these days. I play this game it reminds me a lot of D&D. And i seam to play this A LOT! controls are easy and your camp is pretty easy too. And as advertised you can go anywhere and do anything. Its a completely open world i jope you guys enjoy it as much as i am....but the servers need help. Please fix your servers damn it!

I encounter there's no more item drop in game from yesterday! I tried uninstall by still doesn't work. Hope it someone can help me on this issue soon, really like this game. I rated 5* before after yesterday happening. I'm very sad as I can't even auto hunt at the same area. Now I can't even even find a friendly match because it didn't appear in the even when they were online.

Love the fighting mechanics. However this game feels one sided, stronger guilds take over maps and go in rounds kicking other weak players from the lobby. (Nightmare mode) i get the concept but it doesn't work when the cp difference is 2000+. You don't stand a chance from big money spend players. There is no power balance in nightmare mode. Like create different lobbies depending on your cp range. So we can all have a chance to fight. Would be good if there was dungeon exploration. To kill time

I absolutely love the game...BUT even though my google account is set to auto sign in, I am having consistent issues with "invalid google login" some times going into a diffrent google account, then logging out works for what ever reason. But latley it isnt working. Will return with a phenomenal review once issue is addressed. This review isnt personal, nor intended to be hurtful. I just need help.

Lost interest in playing because of the very steep exp curve, almost a glass ceiling, that begins in level 57. I got to level 58 about a month ago, and after playing daily for 1h a day I am now at 60%. Too little reward for the time investment, completely opposing the first 50 level progression speed. Sadly I stopped playing until this issue is resolved or if more interesting content is added.

title: Pitch Black Wallpaper
description:
Set a pitch black wallpaper on your smartphone or tablet. Make your device look sleek and mysterious, improve battery life, free up some valuable memory, and reduce eyestrain.

Pitch Black Wallpaper is more straightforward and efficient than other black live wallpaper solutions, and beats covering your camera and taking a dark picture as wallpaper.

The app is extremely easy to use: just tap a confirmation button, and get instant results. Congratulations, It's a Black Wallpaper!

No ads, no Internet, and no extra permissions.

comments: A surreal, fun app. Dont know if it makes ringtones. I do know that it did what I wanted, it produced a pitch black screen, giving the impression of infinite darkness.

It's just a black screen. If you're not careful you can get into trouble if you're on a new phone or your settings automatically lock your phone because it is pitch black without prompts or hints as to what the hell is happening or how to get into the phone again and it is totally useless due to ghost installation instructions or warnings. Don't get blacked out.
Oh Wow!!! It's like staring into a Black Hole!!! Super Black...!! Exactly what I wanted. Thanks 😄😁😃🤪
Great black screen app, love it. It works just fine for me with no problems.

Thank you!! Finally no tacky mess disguised as wallpaper. Love this. Simple and truly pitch black. Lastly, to the users on the fence and reading these reviews, please don't listen to those who have implied a simple Google search for black wallpaper and/or a quick hand over your camera lens would give you the same results as you would get with this application, that is 100% incorrect. You will get uneven shades of black and that static look on your screen. I'm not sure if they were completely ignorant to that fact or just purely lazy and did not actually do their own research before coming to such an uneducated conclusion. Nothing is more irritating than reading reviews that are complete nonsense and potentially steer people away from an actual useful app, which I'm sure we all know, are few and far in between these days.

title: Black White Interracial Dating - Interracial Match
description:
Interracial Dating: The New Enlightenment

Less than a century ago, interracial dating was something you didn’t talk about, and something to hide if you did prefer a person of a different color.  There were few places you could go to safely without causing some sort of scandal, and even fewer people who were willing to listen with understanding.  

Maybe it was the rhythm and blues saturating the basements of late night entertainment.  Maybe it was a society lifting out of the Great Depression, with more tolerance accompanying their more affluent life styles.  Maybe it was the boldness of writers, spokes people and celebrities campaigning for civil rights, but by the 1960’s, interracial dating slowly became more acceptable.  

The changing times brought its own set of problems.  Even as the work force became more integrated, with minorities and women stepping into roles once designed for white, professional males, and public places ceased separating or refusing services to minorities, interracial dating was still awkward.  It was an era of general agreement on civil rights, but there weren’t very many among the Depression Years parents who were prepared to bring racial integration into the home. 
 
The Millennial Perspective

The awkward early years of racial integration jump-started interracial dating.  Today, seven percent of the population claims a mixed race heritage.  The number is growing rapidly, with most interviewee’s stating pride in their multiracial origins and claiming their heritage has made them more open to other cultures. 
 
Seven percent is significantly higher than in the 1970’s, when only one percent declared a mixed race background, but analysts feel these number are actually only about half the actual percentage, as many who are mixed race claim only one ethnic background.  The majority of those who claim only one race are middle-aged or older.  
From Age to Regional Location

The younger you are, the easier it is to find a partner for interracial dating.  The twenty to thirty year old set are generally very casual and already have a wide mixture of multi-cultural and multi-racial friends.  Tolerance, however, especially by family and community, can vary greatly according to demographics.  In many areas, especially regions that historically disapproved of mixed race dating, there may no longer be taboos, but the cultural clash still exists.  The family, and even your date, might have stereotypical views of your personal tastes and behaviors.  

Crossing the barriers where racial misconceptions still exist takes fortitude and patience.  Interracial views are changing rapidly but not racial views.  You may experience those uncomfortable moments of somebody going out of their way not to offend you, anxieties concerning appropriate behaviors, or even suspicion and reserved behaviors.  

Unless you are dating someone with exactly the same historical background, social status and religion, you are still going to be challenged by your date’s customs.  For many races, the customs are more engrained than color, status or ancestral origins.  Religion may be an important influence on their lives, even if they no longer declare a religious preference, as they will make time for the traditional values of their family. 
 
But that’s part of what interracial dating is all about.  It’s an opportunity to take a broader look at the world around us, to improve our communications with others, and learn about differing cultures and customs that can enrich our everyday lives.

Black white color app is open to all singles, gay, lesbian or bisexual, all ages, teens, over 40s,over 50s mature or seniors, all races, black, white, mixed, Asian, Indian, Hispanic, Mexican, Latina... Join for free today to meet local singles.

comments: As an app, I like this one. You can read messages, the team is responsive regarding scams, there are options with your search filters, etc. Unfortunately, there are too many people from Ghana apparently trying to hook up with Americans and not enough local participants.

People who are seeking for better partners should have the app! I think this app deserve five stars because it maximizes the basic purpose of dating: the opportunity to capture a woman's attention. There is no place on the planet where you can come across many women who describe themselves as their lives. They tell you what they like and dislike. This is the key information for finding a partner. I found the most honest and beautiful woman on this app. For sure the star rating part of the app gi

Most apps are fake profiles, no responses, or hidden fees.. This app is the exact opposite! I don’t even do reviews but they deserve it! I got three potential hook ups within two hours of having the app (I am attractive, results may vary, just stay in your league lol).. Best hook up app by far!

I wasn't able to sign in nor sign up after downloading the app. Kept getting a network connection error while connected to wi-fi, so I swapped to mobile data, still the same issue. This is really disappointing! I was really looking forward to this trying out this app... 😭😭

This app asks for my location but then it allows me to get messages from people all over the world. I keep getting men messaging me from England, Australia, and Africa. I am in the U.S. I gave the app two stars but came back and changed it to one because there are some nice looking men on there but I don't want to date a man that's not in my same state let alone same country. Plus the age preferences don't work either this app is the worse. Do NOT download this app a waste of space and time!!!

Some of the wallpapers are very unique. The user interface is simple as described but not user friendly. It is not possible to find older wallpapers. The app crashes when I scroll far and there is no filtering or inverted sort. There is no search and no categories. And the pseudo "random" mode is just a preselection.

recent update doesnt work. you guys said that user can set a different wallpaper for home and lock screen, when ever i apply a wallpaper for lock screen, at that time that selected wallpaper automatically applied to the both lock screen as well as home screen.
It has great wallpapers, but the only thing i don't appreciate is that you need online connection to view them.
I had the worst experience of an wallpaper app cuz its not working at all idk why this app exist.. "DON'T DOWNLOAD THIS APP". CUZ YOU ARE JUST GONNA WASTE YOUR DATA AND TIME.

title: Black Survival
description:
* Black Survival aims to be a fair and competitive game without Pay to Win elements!

* Please contact us at https://archbears.helpshift.com regarding install errors or other bug-related problems.

* Game Introduction

“Real-Time Survival Game played by 10 people on a desert island”
1. PvP game played for roughly 20 minutes. Fights are easily done with a single touch.

2. Island is divided into 22 areas; including Hospital, Forest, Beach etc… As time passes, they turn into Restricted areas, narrowing the battlefield.

3. Fencer, actor, doctor, police, hacker, cook, student and more! There are over 35 kinds of different characters to choose from.

4. Gun, Bow, Hand, Blunt, Blade and more! There are total 7 weapon types, each with their own strategies.

5. Hundreds of different ingredients are hidden over the island that can be used to craft over 600 types of weapons, tools and foods.


* Gameplay

1. Find different ingredients and craft a better weapon!
2. Hunt wild animals and level up!
3. Run away from ever expanding Restricted areas!
4. If you want to survive, get stronger faster than everyone else. Kill the rest!


[App Permission Guides]

1. External storage; Read, Write permission
- Used to attach screenshots for customer service request.
- Used for smooth Rewarded Video Ads experience.

2. Device information and Google account access permission
- Used for game account synchronisation and data preservation.
- Used for notification when response arrives to customer message.

----
Developer contact

Company :Nimbleneuron
Address : Gangnam-Gu, Seoul, Republic of Korea

comments: I easily understood the way to play this game in first time. I thought it would be so easy to rank up but nah, i was mistaken. So hard to rank up, but I love this game and how creative BS be. You can mix so many routes, so many strategics, or freestyle if you are good enough to win. Love the feeling of winning :"> Hope you will be more successful 😤

This is my second review of this game. There aren't many features to interact with other people in the game. For example, you can send them friend request but there is no way to chat with them, though in the friends tab you can see a "coming soon" message for more features I guess. Other thing is, when I use scout ability and then look in the map there is no real time update whether an enemy has entered the area you are in after you have used the ability?

Idk, this game isnt for those whose instinct is slow The game is intriguing and fun, the art style is amazing… but in the same time i actually get more and more frustrated with the game as time passes on and now i hate it lol Thats when i decided to stop playing it after days of playing

I absolutely love the game but there's some problem I found. Sometimes when I encounter an enemy, it stop me from moving for a while, and this cause me to get hit first.. This never happen before the rock star update so maybe there's a bug..? I hope you can fix it, thank you :)

I LOVE this game, but the loading times are SO. LONG. Jesus Christ And I am playing on a stable network, like I am literally sitting in front of the router at my house and it's still taking literal minutes to load whatever it is it's loading.

title: Black Wallpaper, AMOLED, Dark Background: Darkify
description:
Are you looking for a Black wallpaper app or dark backgrounds, black images, or black and white wallpaper ? so you are in the right place :)
 
Black wallpaper is an android app for phones and tablets which contain black and white  pictures and dark images , black background allows you to set any pic as a wallpaper or save/share the pics with your friends through WhatsApp, facebook, telegram, twitter .... easily
 
Black wallpaper features
- Clean design
- Black wallpaper doesn't need internet connexion to work well, (note the internet permission is needed only for sharing the black photos)
- Save dark pics easily
- Set as home wallpaper/lock screen background
- Full screen: Black wallpaper shows the funny pictures in full-screen mode
- HD black background, AMOLED Wallpapers
- and more.....

Ads
Black wallpaper has some ads, And we want you to know dear user that developing android apps takes a lot of time and efforts and we provided our apps for free, so the only way we used to get some money is putting ads in our apps.

✭ SET_WALLPAPER : allows Darkify to set images as wallpaper

 Final Words 
We like to provide a good user experience to our apps users by developing free and quality apps, Enjoy it :)

comments: 1st. When a person wants to rate the damn thing, there is a blurb pointing to the 3rd star in the rating selection. Nothing can be written until the, tell us more section, is complete. 2nd. There is a notice every time a tablet is started asking if you want to change the desktop. If I want to change the desktop. I will go into the app to do it. Don't continually pester people!

Love it. This is not an intrusive app. It just gives you different wallpapers to try. I liked most of them. I wish it had more functionality tho like being able to have it change my wallpapers using my favorites on at interval times.

Works Well and has some superior designs. Give it a look, you will be glad you did. I am going to look for a way to donate to encourage them to keep up the good work and know that it is appreciated. Yes I know they get paid by ads, but that's business, not a token of appreciation.

I LOVE IT!!! BEAUTIFUL ORIGINAL CLEAR PICTURES WITH A SLIGHTLY DARK THEME, Its very easy to use, the download works perfectly and I love 90% of what I see, i wish i could have 10000+ wallpapers like this all at once, really the best wallpaper app Ive had in a long time!!! Thankyou!!!

title: Black Screen - A Simple Black Screen App
description:
Just a simple black screen app.

FEATURES
1. Makes screen perfect black ( #000000 ).
2. Hides notification panel.
3. Hides navigation buttons.
4. Prevents screen from sleeping.
That's all.

SOME USEFUL SITUATIONS

1. Use when you don't want to turn off the screen.
2. Quickly make the phone appear locked. Without having to press the lock button.
3.Add the command "open app black screen" to your Google Assistant Bedtime Routine to avoid having to turn your screen off.
4. Use this app icons (x4) for masking pixel icon folder in the home screen.
5. Hide any portion of the screen if your phone supports popup view.


And much more....

comments: I have been using this on my ROG Phone 2, Twindock View mode. When I want one screen to be off, I just run this on one screen. It works fine and would give it a 5*, but one problem for now is that this app prevents my phone to go to sleep when it is running in one of my screens. Edit: 5* now. It was too late for me to realize that the app was designed to not allow the screen to turn off. I reached out to the developer and guess what, he made a version where the phone sleeps! They're awesome.

Nama ooru pasango. xD Anyways what impressed me the most is that it's more simple than what I thought it would be. Open the app and that's it! Awesome! But would have preferred an option to have it above another app. Would have preferred it to be "simple" but not too simple! 😂
Prevent OLED burn in when using phone with an external display (desktop mode) Also prevents phone from entering sleep. Perfect for watching movies on the big screen!

Yes very perfect even though my friends think I'm dumb for having this "non usable" app but this app fits all my need even though it's nothing haha so perfect Thanks :) Also all the app preview pictures are black lol I love that
Can it be used for mirror? Just tried. When activated. Mirror screen went black too. Apart from that it works well.

title: Infinity Black Ops - New Action Games 2020 Offline
description:
Infinity Black Ops is an offline New Action games 2020 FPS of Commando Game!

Challenging storyline of Commando Ops and Infinity Black Ops game where you decide the end of modern battlefield with the best FPS Action game. Lead the elite force against terrorists and become real veteran war hero. Experience the real world war and assassin the most dangerous enemies for survival. Black Commando and Infinity Black Ops have only two options, live or die, it’s time to show your fury of war.

This offline Action game based on compelling FPS Commando Missions making it best commando games play. Commando missions are full of cover operations in this Survival Shooting Game.

Infinity Black Ops - New Action Games FPS is an action survival shooter war game. You are the part of special force in battlefield to end the era of modern war. You are secret assassin with best sniper experience, so, eliminate enemy from all sides in modern warfare. Be the hero of world war and lead the war veteran through abandoned cities, forests and deserts. Show some commando actions and enjoy commando adventures.

COMMANDO AND INFINITY BLACK OPS FEATURES:

> BEST GAMEPLAY EVER: 

Compelling first person shooter game with full customize gameplay to go anywhere, take any strategic position, hide in bushes and take cover shots. In this commando adventure, your mission is to avoid sniper assassins, counter terrorists and spy agents. Greenish environment with new best first person shooter gameplay sets in middle of forest, abandoned military site. Realistic environment and HD graphics for this top action FPS shooter game.

> SINGLE PLAYER MODE: 
If you don’t want to play online fps game then don’t worry you can enjoy this call of battlefield story with best fps shooter experience in this best Commando and Infinity Black Ops - New Action Games FPS. Great realistic sounds effects, compelling graphics and high AI of enemy in this mobile FPS shooter game.

> HIGHLY POWERFULL CONTROLS: 

Modern controls in this commando games play make your unconventional warfare so much thrilling, just aim, press trigger and shoot all the dangerous enemy.

> MODERN REAL ARSENAL:

Unique modern weapon to choose, unlock new weapons with in game cash and then customize them to fire at all range. Use sniper rifle for long range assassination, assault rifle for counter terrorist purpose as special Commando and Infinity Black Ops - New Action Games FPS member. In this FPS game you will play the roll of Commando and Infinity Black Ops - New Action Games FPS, Black Ops, Sniper and unconventional warfare hero. It’s time for you to command the elite sniper killer force against the US military from the frontline with next generation FPS weapons.

> AMAZING ONLINE MULTIPLAYER:

This Commando FPS shooter game is going to include deathmatch, real conquest, realtime PvP battles and much more. Make your own elite force team, lead them as Commando Hunters and then invade battlefields of other armies. Lay out the strategies for survival in the call of battlefield with thrilling and most addictive FPS multiplayer. 

> THE BATTLEFIELD EXPERIENCE:

Get the real battlefield experience on mobile for the first time in this best shooting FPS game Commando and Infinity Black Ops - New Action Games FPS. In this popular shooting game, pickup your weapon aim, shoot and kill enemy with bullets, grenades and powerful sniper rifles. In this best action game you will get big map to enjoy the best open world games play.

> UNCONVENTIONAL WARFARE:

Enemy you are dealing with are highly trained special forces of this FPS shooting game. Show them exciting commando shooting with most compelling and challenging mission.

> Tactical FPS War shooting:

The ultimate challenging task in this Best Commando game is to invade the area of modern army, highly trained special force with high tech weapons. It’s your chance to be the part of Operation Commando and Infinity Black Ops - New Action Games FPS to hunt the special army.

comments: I liked this game until level 18, where I cannot complete the level without killing one soldier who is stuck inside the container(or bunker or office). Tried multiple times with different strategies and tricks, but nothing worked. Cannot proceed to other stages or go to advanced level.

Experience of this game is bloody brilliant, until you get to level 18! There's a guard trapped in a building and obviously you can't complete the level without killing him and I have tried everything and nothing has worked, even looked on YouTube and they can't even show you how, brilliant game until then!!!!

Seems to be a okay game. He only issue that I can find is that even with adjusting the aim sensitivity down to almost nothing, when one goes back to play it defaults back up to almost to the mid point. Aiming is then all over and hard to put on target.

This has been the Greatest version of this game that I have ever played and experienced. It'd be nice to be able to acquire all guns unlock mode for free, but that's okay. I got a couple of tools and accessories for free. And I was even able to save up to but a Sniper Rifle. I can always play, earn, and progress my way through. Best Action game EVER!
I love the game itself it's just that if I play three levels it starts to lag out but other that that the game is really fun.

title: Black Blue
description:
Black Blue is a minimal turn-based puzzle game set in an elegant calligraphy. Brand-new mechanics keeps you entertained for hours of gameplay. Designed specifically for the puzzle lover of all ages.

Play with your friends on a single screen, or challenge yourself in single player mode.

How To Play

• Black places dots randomly between the critical points, you need to find this points and place your dot before the black do 
• You need to cover more of the shape than black to win round
• In order to complete any level you need to fill the circle around preview on top.
• Just pick the gray dots as a start point and watch them flow towards others to connect
• On the single player mode you play as a blue and your turn always last.

Features

• Very unique and minimal design
• Modern puzzle solving at its finest
• Perspective dot to dot calligraphy
• Competitive and entertaining plotting
• Calming with relax music 
• Aesthetically designed 72 hand-crafted levels
• Easy one-handed portrait-mode control
• Google Play Games integration with 16 achievements
• No ads

72 levels contain room of 3 packages. You will face both simplistic geometric and mc escher like perspective shapes together. Every time you need to solve different hook to dominate opponents manipulation along with relaxing music and echo of beautiful sound effects.

Play with your friends on a single screen, or challenge yourself in single player mode.

How To Play

• Black places dots randomly between the critical points, you need to find this points and place your dot before the black do
• You need to cover more of the shape than black to win round
• In order to complete any level you need to fill the circle around preview on top.
• Just pick the gray dots as a start point and watch them flow towards others to connect
• On the single player mode you play as a blue and your turn always last.

Features

• Very unique and minimal design
• Modern puzzle solving at its finest
• Perspective dot to dot calligraphy
• Competitive and entertaining plotting
• Calming with relax music
• Aesthetically designed 72 hand-crafted levels
• Easy one-handed portrait-mode control
• Google Play Games integration with 16 achievements
• No ads

72 levels contain room of 3 packages. You will face both simplistic geometric and mc escher like perspective shapes together. Every time you need to solve different hook to dominate opponents manipulation along with relaxing music and echo of beautiful sound effects.
summary: Turn based puzzle game to boost your logical thinking.
developerAddress: 1509. St No: 11 06530 Çankaya/Ankara
recentChanges:
• Level 3.15 fixed
• Try our new games Hexa Turn and Hexanome!

Thank you everyone for your support. Keep the reviews coming.
comments: Black Blue is a puzzle game based on chance. There are a series of dots which make a pattern and picking a dot(s) will make lines extend in the pattern from the picked dot(s). The goal is to cover more area than the computer opponent. The concept makes an interesting game, but the execution makes it a frustrating game. To add challenge, most puzzles will hide or rotate the patterns, meaning most solutions require trial and error. Plus, there are no instructions, leaving new people confused. 3/5.

Good Game! i enjoyed this game for its choice of background music, simple concept yet interesting gameplay, and overall "feel". My only recommendation would be to allow for night play with a black background, thus allowing for a power savings and less light with which to awake my partner. 😀
This game ramps up in difficulty too wuickly and doesn't give newcomers a chance past the 2 move levels
Doesn't make sense as even when you seem to win the game doesn't let you progress. Very quickly encountered an impossible level with no hints or other ways of getting past.
Little confusing, but fun none the less once you get the hang of it.

comments: This is a great game that's fun to play and keeps me wanting to play more! It has an element of arcade shooter to it that's a refreshing change from other FPS games. My only issues are being told there aren't ads for getting bonus rewards only to have an ad play 2 seconds later for another reward. My other issue is how much I'm showed down and prevented from playing. I understand having play tokens that refresh, but why do I have to wait for an upgrade after paying the coins?

Game is very fun....albeit a bit simplistic. Great graphics and some impressive character models. Menus arent overwhelming which is nice, but could use some variety in gameplay. I'm optimistic for the future of this game. Edit: knocked game down to 2 stars when I saw that the battle pass is 7.49 a week! For that kind of greed, I am only giving 2 stars which is generous.

The game overall is not bad. You clearly only want pay to play players and player who will spend heavily. Most games have a monthly subscription around 10$ a month, but you have opted for a weekly subscription at almost the same price. To move on to the next city you require guns that have to be purchased, which on the whole is not bad, but your pricing for currencies is ridiculous and outrageous. Stop being ridiculously greedy and I may come back and play until then...... Uninstall.

Plays good, Sniper Elite in a very loose MIB universe. Two stars because of the subscription of £6.99 a week! Why is this in there? That's over £335 a year! I understand you need to make money, creating games isn't cheap as everyone wants something for nothing. But that weekly charge - not fair. Is Sony really that hard up they need more money?

Great graphics but it's just too repetitive. I played for roughly 5 minutes and couldn't play anymore because I was bored, sorry to say! It would be a lot better as a full on FPS in my opinion but I get that it is only a mobile game and it is free so that's a positive!

title: Black Operations 2
description:
Black Operations 2 is an epic and addictive combat strategy game filled with exciting adventures and explosive fun. Train your troops, deploy the armies, and battle thousands of other players online!

Justice and duty are calling for you, Commander. Come back to battle against the terrorism and conflicts. With recruiting powerful troops and leading invincible armies, you can beat up evil enemies so as to accomplish glorious achievement.

Features:
* 4 Modes to combat: Campaign, Challenge, Endless Zombie and Online PvP.
* Experience 10 spectacular battlefield in forest, factory, bridge, seaside and more! 
* More than 20 types of troops and battle machines: assault force, M1A2 Tank, AH-64D Apache and cruise missile etc.
* Collect enough gold and win enough PVP victory bonus to upgrade your army.
* Using your expert knowledge of troop deployment and airstrikes to blow the enemy army into piece.
* Easy control, action-packed war game is waiting for your command. 

Having any problems? Any suggestions? We would love to hear from you! You can reach us at support at support@volvapps.com.

Note: Black Operations 2 requires an Internet connection to play (3G/4G or WIFI).

comments: While some enjoy fighting against an AI with seemingly endless energy, the speed at which yours regenerates with makes what could be an enjoyable game a time consuming slog through waves of missiles, troops and a tower with the range of 1/3 of the map. Needs some fine tuning to show that the AI isn't just horribly supported and actually needs to strategize. (This means show the energy the AI has).

I hate the fact that unless you speed money. You have to struggle through every game. Even in the first 5 missions. The enemey gets the unfair advantage right off the start. Better placement. Better upgrades and more troop options. Seems a bit unfair. So unless you fork over some cash. You are kinda stuck with the levels. Miss the old shadez on pc. Was a way better version of the game. Also more fun, graphics of explosions were even better. Kinda disappointed to be honest.

Dissapointed. I loved the online game version but as you cant control the units or move them into transports for this app store game it looses something. Not a bad game but too generic without those features.

The game is alright it gives you an interesting start but once you reach mission9 the game forces you to spend money so I suggest that you can unlock the placeable turrets at level 4 but you can't get any early access for it

i like this game you can buy some cool units and using strategy but the problem you cant controll your units anymore and i cant even play offline mode but this is my favorite game but you change ur controlls you cant play offline you need a wifi to acces the game i hope this would change that i can controll and i can acces without wifi this is the reason i gave three stars

comments: This app SUCKS! BPMs wonderfull!! Over the years I've deeply connected to 18 different ladies!! The site works if you're patient, send real messages, and post real pictures, not just head shots! Show pics of you doing things, places you've been,and you doing your hobbies!! From being there with a member when she woke up, at 3am, from cancer surgery, at Metro. The app has lots of links, most of the time I'm unable to clear my view count and currently I can not make modifications in my account settings. I have to attempt multiple times logging in. There is also this issue whenever o send a message it says the user is unable to receive the message but it goes though which is very strange.
Poor customer service when there is an issue. I went to do something as simple as resetting my password and it didnt work. Fine, but trying to get customer service is a joke

Getting frustrated with lack of customer service to assist me with issues I'm having with resetting my password. I have followed all the instructions... clicking forgot password.. enter my email address. Click the link in the email I received (which confirms I'm using the correct email address)... again enter the information request but I get an error message. I've paid for a service I do not have assess to and impossible to get any live assistance.

title: Murdered Out - Black Icon Pack (Free Version)
description:
Murdered Out (Free Version) is a black on black theme with a focus on simple minimalist, clean, flat & dark black icons with dark wallpapers that give your device a "Murdered Out" look. Icons have transparency to blend in well with your backgrounds. Icons also feature clean & flat handmade designs. Custom wallpapers have variations in darkness for you to experiment with, or use your own backgrounds to create your own black on black murdered out look. This dark theme looks best at night/low light on full brightness.


QUICK TIPS
You can manually edit icons in most launchers by long-pressing the icon you'd like to edit.


Widgets: If your widget stops updating, check your system or battery settings to make sure the app is exempt from battery optimization. More info at https://dontkillmyapp.com/v


FREE VERSION
This is the free version of the app. Get the pro version here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.natewren.murderedout


DISCLAIMER
You may need a 3rd party launcher to apply the icon pack. Please download a launcher (Nova, Evie, Microsoft, etc.) before installing.


COMPATIBLE LAUNCHERS
• Nova Launcher (Recommended)
• Microsoft Launcher (Apply via launcher settings)
• Evie Launcher (Apply via launcher settings)
• Poco Launcher 
• ADW Launcher
• Yandex Launcher (Apply via launcher settings)
• Action Launcher
• Apex Launcher
• Atom Launcher
• Aviate Launcher
• Go Launcher
• Holo Launcher
• Inspire Launcher
• KK Launcher
• Lucid Launcher
• Next Launcher
• Nine Launcher
• Solo Launcher
• Smart Launcher
• Themer
• TSF


Nova is recommended for the best experience and supports icon name search when manually applying icons. For more info on searching while manually applying icons please visit https://natewren.com/manually-edit-icons/.


HOW-TO GUIDE
http://natewren.com/apply


FEATURES
• 2,500+ hand crafted flat, clean & simple black flat HD Icons. Full version has 3,700 icons
• 200+ wallpapers included. Downloadable from the cloud. Browse and save the ones you want. All wallpapers shown are included!
• XXXHDPI high definition black icons included for super large HD screens. All Icons are 192x192
• Analog Clock Widget
• Customized dark black on black wallpapers. Wallpapers have been edited to show off icons nicely.
• Some parts of the flat icons are transparent letting each show the provided dark black on black backgrounds or to show off your own dark backgrounds.
• Contains over 2,500 different clean, flat and simple dark icons with many variations of default black icons such as phone, contacts, camera, etc.
• Wallpaper chooser comes installed
• Muzei support for rotating wallpapers
• New icons added regularly


HOW TO APPLY ICONS VIA ICON PACK
1. Open the app after installing
2. Navigate to "Apply" tab
3. Select your Launcher


HOW TO APPLY ICONS VIA LAUNCHER
1. Open Launcher settings by tapping + holding on an empty area of home screen
2. Select personalization options
3. Select icon pack


HEX CODES
MO hex color: 3e454a
MOM hex color: 000000


FOLLOW ME
Twitter: https://twitter.com/natewren


QUESTIONS/COMMENTS
natewren@gmail.com
http://www.natewren.com

title: The Official Black App
description:
The Black App's mission is to take the momentum of black tech entrepreneurship and put every black owned business on the global market to help us prolong the life of the black dollar in our community. Help us continue to redefine our community! - Business Owners: The Official Black App is the perfect tool to promote your business to over 35,000, and growing, customers who are searching for black owned businesses to support every single day! Listing your business on our platform is very easy.

Download the app today and tap "List Your Business", then complete this business questionnaire and select which listing you would prefer and sit-back and watch the customers come to you! - For App Users: We list black owned business in over 30 states and continue to add black owned businesses everyday. In addition to promoting black owned businesses, app users will be able to enjoy daily black history facts, quotes of the day from historical and modern black figures, a social media wall to connect with other people in our community, and play card games inside our app like Spades.

description:

Black Keyboard Theme is the BEST Keyboard Theme for simple style lovers. Decorate your keyboard with black and blue.Highly recommended to girls who love classic black . 
Whether your phone is a Samsung or Huawei, simple black theme is designed to let you enjoy a faster and smoother mobile operating experience.

☆How to apply Black Keyboard theme ?

Notice: The simple style theme is a plugin app, please download the Main Keyboard app first for  theme to run. Tap the INSTALL button and download it for FREE! If you already have the Main Keyboard installed, please tap on the APPLY button and the Black Keyboard theme will be installed on your phone automatically.

☆Features :

1) Theme Center: Find all sorts of theme categories, including tech, basic, cool, crystal(krystal), golden, pink, la la stars and many more. You can find all the themes you love in the Keyboard (typewriter) theme center.

2) Animated themes: Make you phone unique with all sorts of cool animated effects.

3) Touch tone themes: Personalize the touch tone of your keyboard (typewriter) with different themes. Become a pianist while typing with our Piano theme or go retro with our Mechanical Keyboard (typewriter) theme's typewriter tone. There are loads more supported themes waiting for you to explore.

4) Customizable fonts: Each theme comes with its matching font style, so you could enjoy a fuller experience of your chosen theme. More font styles will be available in the future, rest assured that you will find the font style you love.

5) Function keys: Keyboard (typewriter) allows you to personalize your function keys using different themes. 

6) Large emoji selection: When you feel that words are not enough to express your feelings, try sending an emoji! A large selection of emoji is pre-installed on Keyboard (typewriter) for you to add more fun to your chats!

comments: I really love the color combination and all. I have nothing bad to say. It's perfect!

The themes are pretty cool but the best part is the text-predicting aspect which is way more useful than the standad keyboards and also suggests emojis if tgere is one that relates to the words you are typing. This 🐆 app is awesome 🌟 and can really speed up your typing.
It's good but ads are a bit much.

BEAUTIFUL!! Just what I was looking for. Not croweded. Not busy. Nice and clean!! I download the black keyboard its perfect! The text prediction awesome, and the big buttons are awesome as well!! Thank you. 😍
Black Keyboard looks great with that Cheetah Keyboard app. It has a computer keyboard look, with the white on black. I also like the font, and blue highlighting.

title: Hypocam
description:
Hypocam is the ultimate black and white camera.

—

SHOOT — Be in control of your shoot with our live-view controls and feel the quality of black and white photography, capturing the essence.

EDIT — We have studied and tested lots of different creative tools developed exclusively for monochrome photography to provide you a unique experience.

BE INSPIRED — With the built-in news feed you could be always updated with the latest news and the best selection of black&white photos.

SHARE — Post your unique b&w photos to the most famous social network and tag #hypocam to be part of the best black and white community.

STORE — Enhance your edit experience and your post process with the latest preset and tools we are continuing to study to provide you the best creative tools available on the market.

—

ENHANCING PEOPLE STORIES™
Our goal is to empower all the creative tools available, providing the best instruments and experience ever allowing people to create and connect. Hypocam is the best professional camera in your pocket.
Every single aspect of everyday life is important because it allow us to become closer to our dreams so has to be remembered. Make every moment unforgettable and tell your story, because every people's story is important and need to be told.

—

This is only just the beginning.
We are the only black and white photo App.
Founded in 2013 Hypocam we will never stop providing the best tools possible.
—

Code by Pierre Gougelet – XnView - IOAPPS
Photos by Temi Coker, Eric Ward and Noell Oszvald

—

Contact us for any information:
info@hypocam.com

comments: Looks like great app! However I can not find a way to set the focal length (crop factor), which is crucial for me. I can change it while shooting, but it resets to wide angle every time I go back to the app, so unfortunately it is not usable for me. Also, I noticed that the photos are not stored as JPGs in any folder, only inside the app, and when you uninstall it they are gone! So be careful.

Downloaded this app today. Took like three pictures with it and immediately purchased the filter sets and texture sets. This is my camera now! This is amazing! Lifelong photographer and used 35 millimeter my whole life and always preferred black and white, but I've struggled to find my place in digital photography until now. Highly recommend this app to anyone serious about black and white photography, especially with a smartphone! THIS IS YOUR APP! Thank you so much for this gamechanger!!

What a terrible app! I paid for the extras and really regret it. WHERE ARE THE PICTURES! I've spent hours digging through folders on my phone looking for the pictures. I tried various export functions and they are appearing in ones and twos in different folders. As another reviewer pointed out - what an appalling interface! So unintuitve! The Hypocam folder is empty but I see the pictures in the app. WHERE ARE THEY!!!!!!!!!!!

Nice b&w photography. But it's buggy (android 9, LG) Too often a previously taken photo somehow gets randomly overlaid on the shooting preview window obscuring what you're trying to photograph...what is that all about?!

Very good app among hundreds of selfie-beautify-vsco-clones. Really made for those, who love bw-photography. And this inspirational section with awesome works of professional photographers (each with a little story about the author) — respect for that!

title: Basic Black Theme for Smart Launcher
description:
A modern theme that will make your home screen black and white, improving the contrast and the readability of all the items on the screen. Also, this theme dynamically generates the icons for all your apps. This means finally all your icons will be skinned!

This theme is particularly suggested on devices with AMOLED displays because it can turn off large parts of your display and save your battery!

You can download SmartLauncher here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=ginlemon.flowerfree

To use it, open Smart Launcher, enter in Preferences then select Theme.

comments: I signed up, but I never received the verification email so I want not able to sign in.

I have just become a new member and I think this dating site is awesome. I like the security with the photo and verifying the photo so there is no phishing or scammers. I like the way the systen is set up for your profile. I like the easy manuvering on the site. I hope to have great success on this site.

I read the reviews before I subscribed and I should've listen to the review that stated that they don't receive messages. The verification process is great but unfortunately this app isn't for me. The customer service also needs improvement. I have sent several emails via the app and from my personal account requesting not to be automatically renewed and to remove my profile from the website. Unfortunately no one has responded to my request.

This is Awesome...!!! I Love how everyone is verified through facial recognition and other ways...!!! Allows you to know it is safe to connect...!!! If there is any problems with the app everything is fixed right away...!!! From Admin to all participants everyone is respectful and courteous...!!!

This is a great app for meeting singles because of the steps that the administrators have taken to impede the 'catfishing' that is prevalent with most 'free' dating apps. In addition to the set up & verication of the account, another great feature is 'paid membership'. By making the app a paid membership app to read messages, it helps to deter those who are not serious. These two features help to reduce scammers and makes the RBL dating app great!

title: Black Desert+ for Console
description:
Black Desert+ allows you to keep up-to-date with all your Black Desert console news. Never miss a single moment of Black Desert with the latest companion app!
(PC version will be released in the 1st half of 2020!)

ALWAYS be on time to defeat World Bosses by being alerted with World Boss Summon times.

WATCH your favorite Black Desert streams through Black Desert TV.

MANAGE your Central Market wallet by selling and purchasing items. All available through your mobile device!

REDEEM coupons codes through Black Desert+ for amazing in-game rewards!

HAVING PROBLEMS? Customer Support for Black Desert console is readily available without the hassle of turning on your console.

***In order to use some of the features of Black Desert+, you must have your Black Desert game account linked to your Black Desert web account.

**To create a web account, please go to console.playblackdesert.com and sign up! To link your web account to your game account, go into Black Desert on your console > Profile, then “Link Account”.

title: Official Black Wall Street
description:
Official Black Wall Street is a next generation digital platform helping to recirculate the Black dollar and strengthen the local economy in Black communities.


Top 5 reasons to join OBWS?
- Join a movement of 1.16 million OBWS users who are eager to Buy Black.
- Search for both brick and mortar and online-based businesses you can support.
- Find special offers from your favorite Black-owned businesses.
- Be alerted whenever you're near a Black-owned businesses and use the "Nearby" tab to see what's around you.
- Read real reviews from kinfolk around the country and share your own experiences.
- Bookmark your favorite businesses and be alerted whenever they add a new special offer.
- Are you a Black entrepreneur? Easily create a listing for your business with one click. (If you're not an entrepreneur but know of a Black-owned business that isn't listed, share the wealth and submit a free listing!)
- Two-way messaging system to bridge the gap between Black entrepreneurs and their consumers.

This is just the beginning... Join the movement and help rebuild Black Wall Street.

comments: The concept is exactly what we need. The app still needs some work but I'm sure it's being updated and improved everyday. We have to nurture small things so they can grow into big things. That can't happen if we are quick to dismiss it.

I'd heard about this app or a website like it a while back but never got around to looking for it. This app is fantastic. Layout's intuitive, trendy/modern aesthetic to it. Hope this app stays and keeps growing. Only suggestions I would have are changing city/state selection to tiered dropdowns vs multiple checkboxes, and some kind of workflow in the app for submitted businesses so folks can monitor when a business they submitted is verified.
Recommendation, reorganize layout to provide categories on main page. Restaurants, Local Business, Investments etc provide gps location of each listing or route to Google maps

The app is beautiful and I was excited to use it, but it keeps crashing unfortunately. Also, when I click the "nearby" option on the menu it shows me a map instead of the businesses that's near me. Pretty odd. Hopefully this all can be fixed soon!

I travel a lot and this app initially appeared to be phenomenal. I have submit numerous business for BWS. Unfortunately none of the business in my area that would qualify have been contacted/listed. Gives the impression there are 3 in my city. It leads me to believe it could be possible for other areas. I have tried to contact BWS several times over the last year with no result. I didnt want to give a low review. Perhaps there was an error on my part nonetheless with the lack of communication I am not able to give this app, at this time, a positive rating.

comments: Such an amazing game, it reeks of P2W atmosphere. Confirmed it after installing, this was one of the games I played earlier and My Review seems to be vanished without a trace in this game. So there's not much choice to progress, when your beginning gears sucks from the very moment you played the game!?!

Wow, what a game. Realistic environment with some great shooting and challenging missions. Just downloaded it and start playing. A great story line. Want some extra features and levels in update. Probably one of the best games as a shooting game and a good thing is that it is offline. Weapons are great from World War weapons with great guns and animations. Great game guys. Must play once. Recommended.

This has been the Greatest version of this game that I have ever played and experienced. It'd be nice to be able to acquire all guns unlock mode for free, but that's okay. I got a couple of tools and accessories for free. And I was even able to save up to but a Sniper Rifle. I can always play, earn, and progress my way through. Best Action game EVER!

What you need to know about the game before you download it. There is nothing really good about this game except for it running smooth. Once you finish a mission you are immediately hit with advertisment. You are also stuck with the default sensitivity(can not be changed).

Great game! But still need a lot of inprovements. Faster shifting weapon. Additional maps and missions. hopefully can connect to gamepad. Other modes. More weapons choices. Otherwise, its a good game.

title: Pure Black Wallpaper
description:
Set a pure black background on your device. Give your device a clean look, and make your home screen apps stand out. 

Consider purchasing the pro version to set black background to home and lockscreen, and to get access to AMOLED walls which also save battery!

Advantages of using this app
• Pure Black Wallpaper is different to alternate live wallpaper solutions, as it uses no where near as much memory as a live wallpaper.
• This app also beats covering your camera to set a black wallpaper, as this solution requires you to save the photo to device storage, and load it into the memory. With this app you do not need to load any data from storage

How to use this app
• Simply open the app, use the Material Design Navigation bar to navigate to the 'Apply' section, click the 'Set Black Wallpaper' button and your done. You will now have a stunning black home screen wallpaper and lock screen image

App Permissions
This app requires one permission, which is the ability to set a wallpaper on your device. This is needed for obvious reasons ;-)

This app contains no ads, does not need an internet connection, and does not have any suspect permissions. Give it a try today!

title: Black Stories
description:
Black Stories — dodgy and gloomy stories which are based on real events…
Stories should be solved in the company of friends or acquaintances.

Purpose of the game:
Learn the true cause of the dark history that happened by using logic and asking simple questions that can be only answered "yes", "no" or "it does not matter".

Rules:
Choose one person to be a narrator.
The narrator reads only the short story to the others and then reads the full story to himself.
People ask questions and he can answer only "yes", "no", "it does not matter".
The story is finished when somebody tells the full version of the story.

Available languages:
-English
-Deutsch
-Português
-Español
-Русский

nice app to play a game, but the English translations are pretty bad. Some stories dont make any sense cuz stuff doesnt add up
Some stories were good, some were too American oriented.

title: Black News Alerts
description: Black News Alerts is your connection to breaking and intimate black news.  Inherently rooting for anything and everything black, the BNA app purposes to alert the black community on positive community happenings globally.  Get accurate and late breaking crime information (including detailed information on any alleged police brutality events), track your favorite black celebrities and stay up on the politics, education and the economy.  The app also allows users to submit black news, stories and footage directly to our news teams.  Black News Alerts is powered by the longstanding Urban Newsroom, the most trusted online source for urban and black news.

5 Stars! I've used about 50 Wallpaper Apps on about 25 devices & this is a very unique & underrated App. Positively the BEST! Very small in size for all you get. Best looking color choices. MINOR advertisements & that is more than fair considering this is free. Does save alot of battery & I use it on all Android devices including ZTE, Samsung, Acer, Moto G6 Play, LG, Alcatel & even Acer 15 Chromebook. I have NEVER had any problems & ease of selection is 2nd to none. Perfect layout & GENIUS App!
Works great on my Galaxy S10e, even on the dark side of the moon (52776)!
i love it.easy to use...

comments: It is a good game that you can spend a lot of time trying to get better ships and gear but it will require joining a corp and spending some money to advance. But I still enjoy the game. I started playing when battleships were the best ships to have. This game has changed alot.

Still has potential but this game needs some serious changes... The game community here seems pretty toxic! There is NO safe way to earn credits for better gear after lvl 15. Large player packs hunt the border zone shooting anything on sight so you'll lose almost everything. Join a corporation? Most salty vets treat new players like a corporate spies. So your mostly ignored and left to fend for yourself. The player controlled economy is ridiculous! Friendly/helpful players so hard to find!!!

Simple game with lots of depth, not the prettiest graphics but that doesn't matter. Hunt with friends, form alliances, get bigger ships, better gear. There's lots to this game. Love it. Ign SydSloth if you need someone to farm with

Game looked promising until you reach lvl 15 then whack can't farm in grey and get mugged in black by either jumping into unexplored sectors with big npc,s or Corp hit squads then all your farmed resources gone and a wedge of you cash too . Levelling up is very slow aswell played for a whole week and still not reached lvl 16 , not come across any decent weapons as yet , a very very very slow grind of a game have now delete it lvl up to slow

Its okay game weird user interface as i cant really tell when things are moving foward and the ship movement is odd too is there anyway to see youre ship fighting instead of a flashing screen and a little text at the bottom

title: Black Clover Phantom Knights
description:
Defend the kingdom while aiming to create the strongest Magic
Knights Brigade in this exciting new Kingdom Defense RPG!

▼Magic battles where your strategies decide the outcome!
Choosing the right characters and formations is the key to victory.
Work together with your teammates to unleash powerful combo
attacks using the All-Out Magic (AOM) System
and dominate battles with stunning Arcane Arts!

▼An original story!
Join familiar faces like Asta, Noelle, and Yami in an all-new adventure!
You can also meet Jien—a completely original character to this game!
Enjoy a unique Black Clover story that can only be experienced here!

▼Protect the Clover Kingdom!
Team up with other players to protect the Clover Kingdom from
those who wish to harm it!

▼Strengthen your Brigade members!
Gather your favorite characters and build your own unique Brigade!
Unlock their Grimoire Boards to power them up!
Equip Relics to grant them various effects to help them fight their best!

▼Deploy your Brigade members!
Send characters out to explore the country and they'll come back
with various items!
They can even find hidden Dungeon Quests!
Clear the dungeons to get incredible items!

▼Find the latest news here:

- Official Website

Note:
This game contains some items available for in-app purchase that can enhance gameplay and speed up your progress. In-app purchases can be disabled in your device settings, see
https://support.google.com/googleplay/answer/1626831?hl=en for more details.
summary: The popular anime Black Clover finally has a mobile game!
developerAddress: 東京都港区芝5-37-8　バンダイナムコ未来研究所
recentChanges: - Addressed some in-game issues.
comments: The international debut was rushed, but overall I very much enjoy the fast paced gameplay and world! If you love Black Clover I highly recommend this game. Some negatives: Presently the banners are being pushed too quickly and there isn't time to take full advantage of them, there is no way to get lots of Gems for summoning except for daily missions, and apart from the PVP Arena there isn't a whole lot to do in-game after a certain point is reached.

Great game.... But every update that is suppose to "fix bugs" just creates more bugs. I keep getting kicked out the app and I keep losing in the arena because of this. Out of the 5 swords I did, I only had one that didn't disconnect. Everyone quest I don't skip logs me out as well. Overall great game but way to many bugs for me actually want to put anymore money into it. Edit: Fixed the disconnecting part for me. But losing interest. The arena should have a shop. Weekly arena doesn't give enough

The game has been pretty good, some crashing issues which causes stamina loss and ruin any attempt at a perfect arena record. I was excited to give phantom trials a shot, but everytime I kill the blue slime in the first level I experience a long freeze and then I crash. I've done it three different times and the result is always the same everyone else can die, except the blue slime. Edit:Most recent update makes the game unplayable, I can't play the game or I crash I can only skip.

Loading screens are not that long but it does make me a bit frustrated. The game play though, I prefer to have a game which helps me play through main quests easily for a week or two by giving simple enemies at first and harder later. But in this game, the quests are very hard, I lost on the 3rd quest due to a low cp number. It makes me want to quit, because when i play the game for the first time, i don't know how the game works, and to lose so early is making me lose interest in this game.

You take away banners before anyone has a chance to get anything. You change events more then any game I know. The terrible system you have in place for obtaining black jewels makes it hard for anyone who doesn't pay to even have a chance. 1 week for banners is not enough time. Fix your issues before you end up like many other games. No longer in service.

title: Black Wallpaper, AMOLED, Dark Background: iDarkify
description:
Black wallpaper App provides you premium dark backgrounds and cool Amoled HD Wallpapers, which help you save your device battery by atleast 15%.

The app provides you with pitch black wallpaper and quench your thirst for dark backgrounds and super AMOLED wallpaper.



i Darkify
Wallpapers reflect your personality and black wallpaper app provides you with variety of dark background for your mobile to bring your screen to life. Daily wallpaper app provides you with a wide variety of handpicked collection of Dark images, Amoled wallpaper.

You can set these HD Backgrounds as wallpaper and personalize you screen, save the images and share them with your friends using popular social media platforms. iDarkify also allows you to set automatic change of wallpaper with predefined timings, so now you get a new wallpaper when you wakeup everyday.

Wallpapers provided by the best wallpaper app support the below devices:-
S7, S7 Edge, S8, S8+, S9, S9+, Note 9, Note 8, Note 7, Pixel series and oneplus6 series, Poco F1 etc.



Black wallpaper features:


- Clean design and user friendly user interface for ease of use
- Save backgrounds on your device.
- Set Black wallpapers as backgrounds and extend battery life by 15%.
- Use the app offline and save internet cost and battery too, (note the internet permission is needed only for sharing the black photos)
- Tap to zoom the HD backgrounds.
- Mark the images you like as favourite.
- Murky wallpapers also allows you to change the wallpaper automatically at predefined set of timings.


Ads


Dear user, we have put some ads in iDarify. Please understand that making and android app is time consuming and laborious activity and the only benefit the developer can get is by earning through ads. Though if you still don’t want to see the ads, just use the app without internet. 


Permissions in black wallpaper:


✭ SET_WALLPAPER : allows Blackify to set images as wallpaper
✭ WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE : allows Blackify to save screensavers to your SD Card 
✭ INTERNET, ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE : for sharing images 

Contents:
The free wallpaper app contains Dope , Cool , Superhero , motivational , skull , hurt  and girly wallpaper.

Disclaimer:

Some Dark backgrounds used in this application are copyright to their respective owners and usage falls within the "Fair Usage" guidelines. If you have any issues with the content here within or the owner wants his/her images removed from the app please contact us at shreeappz@gmail.com

title: Color XO - Black Culture Color By Number Pixel Art
description:
Not your traditional Coloring Book App! Color XO is the First Ever Color-by-Numbers Pixel Game Celebrating Women, Black Culture & Diversity! Hours of stress relief at your fingertips! Relax. Color. Focus & Enjoy!

Colorists, puzzle fans, and challenge seekers, if you love black girl magic then this black color by numbers book is right for you. Pixel art sandbox number coloring games are popular among children and adults. Join millions in a relaxing experience and get ready to become a lover of coloring tiny pixel art. Level up, Paint by numbers like Picasso and Collect your Coins with our fun categories ranging from Basic to Expert levels. Original images created from Entrepreneurs Color Too, Adult Coloring Book Pages! Created for adults but kid friendly art!

Enjoy time away from the daily routine - calm down and unwind with this black excellence and melanin filled adult coloring book. Develop your concentration, color matching skills, accuracy and precision.

HOW TO PLAY:  
It’s easy! Just use two fingers to zoom a picture until cells with numbers appear. Choose colors in the palette and color cells with matching numbers pixel by pixel. Start at the basic level and collect your coins to unlock expert levels in all other categories. Run out of coins? No worries! RE-up in our store and get back to enjoying your favorite black ethnic coloring book!

NOTE:
Enable magnifying glass by tapping and holding a number in the game. This allows you to color more accurately and quicker.

Features:
❤️ 100+ amazing pictures to paint: 80’s & 90’s Retro and Hip Hop Coloring Art, HBCU Sorority & Black College inspiration, Black Women in Business and Entrepreneurship, Afros, Locs, Animals, and more.

❤️ Pixel Art Camera. Take selfies or use any photos to color your own pixilated images!

❤️ Various coloring tools. Use Magic Wand to paint multiple neighboring cells of the same number and Color Splash to color multiple neighboring cells of any numbers;

❤️ Quick sharing. Share your art with friends on social networks or email in just one tap

❤️ Easy coloring. Enjoy intuitive design and smooth performance of Pixel Art.

❤️ Weekly Motivation 

❤️ Sound ON/OFF

❤️ Works offline! No wifi needed!



Terms of Service: https://entrepreneurscolortoo.com/pages/colorxo-terms

Privacy Policy: https://entrepreneurscolortoo.com/pages/colorxo-privacy

XO,

Color XO

comments: It's an excellent concept...however needs some work. I get lost in the coloring and finally finish only to not get the coins. Go back in to see that nothing I'd been working on was saved. That's a deal breaker. Uninstalling for now. I hope this annoying glitch gets fixed soon. Bye for now tho.

I've downloaded the app and all the pictures are in gray and white and I can't color anything. I've selected several pics to try and color and nothing. When I choose a number I can see where it lights up to show where the color is supposed to go, but when I tap it, it doesn't color.

App worked great and was really fun and relaxing for about a week then the app stopped saving my progress. I spent about an hour working on a picture I had already started. When I came back to the picture the next day, none of the work I did the previous day was there. I began working on the picture again and again my progress was not saved. Really disappointed in an app that started off so great.

I can spend hours coloring in this app, and sometimes I dont finish. It totally sucks that there is no save button, because more than once I've went back in and they deducted coins that I've collected, but they've also restarted the pages I was coloring. It sucks when you spend all that time, only to have to start over.

I enjoy the game but this last update took away the pic I was working on. So not fair all the time I spent on it for it to disappear before I completed it. And it would be nice if completed pics showed up below pics I'm working on, instead of having to scroll to get to the ones I'm working on.

     - Various options for the particles. Maybe you want more particles on your screen? Or you want them to move faster? Or maybe you just want them to be bigger. 

We hope you enjoy our redesigned and feature packed new live wallpaper app!

It's easy to apply Black live wallpaper. Choose your background, choose your metal shapes, click apply and Set wallpaper.
If that doesn't work apply Black live wallpaper from your phone's live wallpapers list.
descriptionHTML:
Great black abstract live wallpaper that will make your background very cool and modern.

Black live wallpaper is a beautiful app with black and dark images and live animations. You will find 5 abstract black wallpapers with various elements and lines. Metal ball elements will fall over the screen. Create your own live wallpaper, choose your image and elements and personalize it as you wish.

You can also set all the backgrounds you see in Black live wallpaper as normal phone wallpapers with no animations.

What you will find in Black live wallpaper:
❀ 5 high quality wallpapers: with 3D elements and hd metal ball in different shades as blue, dark, silver or green.
❀ Suitable app for girls and boys who like a simple black and modern design.

- Unique live wallpapers with exclusive design and cool backgrounds.

New features:
- more than 8 different particles
- more than 10 different animations
- Magic touch: highly requested, now you have a live wallpaper that you can play with. We added 5 different touch effects. You can always disable this feature.
- Various options for the particles. Maybe you want more particles on your screen? Or you want them to move faster? Or maybe you just want them to be bigger.

We hope you enjoy our redesigned and feature packed new live wallpaper app!

It's easy to apply Black live wallpaper. Choose your background, choose your metal shapes, click apply and Set wallpaper.
If that doesn't work apply Black live wallpaper from your phone's live wallpapers list.
summary: Best black live wallpapers with colorful or simple animations and hd design!
recentChanges:
- Added a new feature: My photo live wallpaper. Now you can add your own photo and enjoy the live effects
- Optimized resources. Devices will now use less memory when the live wallpaper is applied
comments: I was doubtful when I was downloading this app, but 8 was so wrong. It's magical, it's stunning,, I love it!!
Great looking designed for a black background, also very nice effects to choose from.

i've nevr had live wallpapers tht weren't already installed in my phone. this app is awesome as it provides several options for the effects tht way it can be set to the way you would like for it to appear.
Loved it very much ..keep it up

title: Black and White Blackboard Theme

title: BlackGuide: Black Businesses & Black Communities
description:
The BlackGuide App created by the National Black Guide LLC (NBG Network) is the "Black City Resource Guide - Black Businesses & Black Communities" for those who live in or travel city-to-city and want to know what's happening: city news, locate a black business, local events information and resources for African Americans living locally and nationwide.

List your Black Business & Events for FREE

Key Features: 

* Pick Your City ... 15+ major cities represented and growing
* Distance to closest Black Businesses (100 mi radius)
* Black Business Directory (per City)
* Featured Black Entrepreneurs 
* Local & National News
* Community Forum
* Business / Community Podcast
* Local Event Calendars [Submit Events for FREE]
* Advertise on our Websites
* Subscribe to our Email Lists
* BlackGuide App Social Media Wall
* Shop our BlackGuide Products
* Stay up to date with BlackGuideApp / NBG Initiatives
* And More....

comments: This app provides many information which i want to know. I recommended it to everyone !
The app provided minimal information in the black directory and event guide (DC & LA). Perhaps focus on a few cities and scale up from there. It's a great idea, but it hasn't been fully executed.
Great app. Great resources. Map feature helped me find Black businesses in my backyard and even while I was traveling. Also is great for locating events. I love the news feature as well.
This app is simple to use and proves a TON of resources at your finger tips. It's also a great way to support other businesses in our community.
I'm sure it's a great app, just doesn't have the city I live in. maybe there could be a way to wiki this app and allow folks in other areas to contribute?
